document.full_text: a new tablet by toshiba, the toshiba thrive, will be available for pre-sale on june 13, and in stores by july 10, the company said thursday.
document.title: toshiba's tablet is for laptop people
lines_and_colors: a new tablet by toshiba, the toshiba thrive, will be available for pre-sale on june 13, and in stores by july 10, the company said thursday.
